bug.author: love-mj
bug.summary: Propellers render outside MultiRotor #784ï¼Œhow to solve it?
bug.description: if I leave it running long enough, the propellers end up outside of the MultiRotor. Exact placement of the rotor varies but they move outside of the frame. When I have run overnight I have seen this issue consistently, but I do not have an exact time to failure. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/37679671/84003783-22618f00-a99d-11ea-8468-e6382f497e32.png></denchmark-link>
